title: Short title
context: ARTICLE 7. [OLD] WAREHOUSE RECEIPTS, BILLS OF LADING AND OTHER DOCUMENTS OF TITLE §§490:7-101 to 490:7-603 REPEALED. L 2004, c 163, §34. ARTICLE 7. DOCUMENTS OF TITLE PART 1. GENERAL §490:7-101 Short title. This article shall be known and may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code&ndash;Documents of Title. [L 2004, c 163, pt of §1]
